title: Travelhouse Underseat Hardshell Carry On Luggage 20" Lightweight Hardside Suitcase With Silent Spinner Wheels; Purple;  21" carry-on hardside underseat luggage; Color: Blue, Black, Orange, Purple, Green, Light Green, Light Purple; ABS hard shell, steel rod; Capacity: 33L; Size: 21.85" x 8.35" x 14.76" (L x W x H); Weight: 5.62lb; 360 degree silent double spinner wheels
descriptions:
**Product Listing:**
 
Introducing the Travelhouse Underseat Hardshell Carry On Luggage 20" - the perfect companion for your 1-3 day trips. This hardside underseat luggage is designed with ABS hard shell material, ensuring durability and protection for your belongings. Its sleek design comes in a variety of colors including Blue, Black, Orange, Purple, Green, Light Green, and Light Purple, allowing you to choose your favorite.

With dimensions measuring 21.85 inches in length, 8.35 inches in width, and 14.76 inches in height, this carry on luggage provides ample space for your essentials. It has a capacity of 33 liters, allowing you to pack efficiently for your journey. The lightweight design, weighing only 5.62 pounds, ensures easy portability.

Equipped with 360 degree silent double spinner wheels, this luggage offers smooth maneuverability in any direction. The steel rod handle provides sturdy support, making it easy to navigate through crowded airports. The TSA lock ensures the security of your belongings, providing peace of mind during your travels.

The interior of this luggage features a mesh zip pocket and elasticated straps, allowing for organized packing and securing your items in place. The full capacity design maximizes storage space, ensuring you can bring everything you need. 

Choose the Travelhouse Underseat Hardshell Carry On Luggage 20" for a stylish, durable, and convenient travel experience.
